metadata.title: USN-6245-1 -- Trove vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Adam Bell discovered that Trove incorrectly handled arguments to the backup command. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6245-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-trove - 2:17.0.0-0ubuntu1.1 trove-api - 2:17.0.0-0ubuntu1.1 trove-common - 2:17.0.0-0ubuntu1.1 trove-conductor - 2:17.0.0-0ubuntu1.1 trove-doc - 2:17.0.0-0ubuntu1.1 trove-guestagent - 2:17.0.0-0ubuntu1.1 trove-taskmanager - 2:17.0.0-0ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
